рм╢рм┐рм╢рнБ рмЯрм┐рмХрм╛ рмХрм╛рм░рнНрмпрнНрнЯрм╕рнВрмЪрнА (2025):

complete_schedule.english:
Baby Vaccination Schedule (2025):
ЁЯФ╕ At Birth: BCG + Hepatitis B
ЁЯФ╕ 6 Weeks: OPV + IPV + Pentavalent + Rotavirus + PCV
ЁЯФ╕ 10 Weeks: OPV + Pentavalent + Rotavirus
ЁЯФ╕ 14 Weeks: OPV + IPV + Pentavalent + Rotavirus + PCV
ЁЯФ╕ 9-12 Months: MR Vaccine + PCV Booster
ЁЯФ╕ 16-24 Months: MR Vaccine (2nd dose)

Contact your nearest health center.
